plot: A singing couple gets their own television show, and the strains of putting on a TV show every week starts to jeopardize their relationship.
title: Two Gals and a Guy
plot_es: A singing couple gets their own television show, and the strains of putting on a TV show every week starts to jeopardize their relationship.
plot_en: A singing couple gets their own television show, and the strains of putting on a TV show every week starts to jeopardize their relationship.
